title: Cherry streusel pie
ingredients: ['Pastry', '300g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '100g soft unsalted butter', '150g caster sugar', '1 egg', 'Filling', '3 eggs', '150g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla sugar', '500g low fat quark', 'a dash lemon juice', '2 tablespoons semolina', '500g morello (sour) cherries, fresh or frozen, pitted']
